title: Missing Block
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description After waiting more than 276 days to propose a block, the day came and I find that it is missing. I have all the correct attestations, was it a mevboost failure? ## üî• Error validador service

Ubuntu 20.04 Geth Version: 1.11.6-stable Git Commit: ea9e62ca3db5c33aa7438ebf39c189afd53c6bf8 Architecture: amd64 Go Version: go1.20.3 @nodoeth:~# prysm version Latest Prysm version is v4.0.4. Mev-Boost 1.5.0

It looks like a case of poor network connection of your validator, at least in this timeframe, but maybe even generally.

Slot 6,474,645 was scheduled to start at timestamp `1,684,519,763`, which is `Fri May 19 2023 18:09:23 GMT+0000`

The getHeader response is only received at second 26, which is already 3 seconds into the slot. And then the getPayload request hit the relay 4220ms into the slot, which is 200ms after the cutoff time (4s).

@metachris 
my speed is very stable
 ```
  Ookla Rapid Test

        Server: Virgin telco - Derio (id: 39782)
           ISP: Adamo Telecom Iberia S.A.
Idle latency: 13.86 ms (jitter: 0.08 ms, low: 13.78 ms, high: 14.06 ms)
      Download: 895.22 Mbps (data used: 1.2 GB)
                   24.44 ms (jitter: 1.78 ms, low: 14.08 ms, high: 55.29 ms)
        Upload: 537.30 Mbps (data used: 443.6 MB)
                   14.44 ms (jitter: 0.83 ms, low: 13.57 ms, high: 29.41 ms)
   Packet loss: Not available.
```
It seems that something similar has happened to more people from what I have seen on reddit, I have added a flag that the prysm team told me --build-block-parallel=true
and I have also removed 2 relays
HW: i5 6500T , 32Gb ram DDR4, 2TB SSD, 512 Gb Nvme and 1000/600 internet speed

I understand that this is frustrating. Sadly it looks like it was a one-off network issue between your proposer and the relays. Closing this issue now.

For reference, here's a PR that will improve logging in such situations: https://github.com/flashbots/mev-boost/pull/508

opened an issue to discuss possible mitigations: https://github.com/flashbots/mev-boost/issues/518

thanks for the detailed report! üôè
